review: This thing is sweet. It doesn't do everything that an Apple TV or Fire TV will do, but it is a fraction of the price! Right when I got it I plugged it in, and within 5 minutes I was casting netflix, YouTube, Hulu and anything else I wanted straight from my iPhone. Want the cheapest way to make your TV as close to a smart tv as possible? This is a no brainer, the Chromecast is great.
